data.title: ‘Faster Than Most Expect’—BlackRock CEO Issues ‘Enormous’ Price Prediction As Bitcoin Suddenly Soars Toward $2 Trillion
data.description: The chief executive of the world’s largest asset manager BlackRock has predicted the “enormous growth” of crypto-based tokenization in coming years...
data.author: Billy Bambrough
data.keywords: Larry Fink,Donald Trump,BlackRock,bitcoin,bitcoin price,bitcoin price prediction
